1010101111110010 0010110011111001 1 -> sum: 1101100011101100, cout: 0
0010110101101001 1100001100101101 1 -> sum: 1111000010010111, cout: 0
0100111111010100 0111000101001001 0 -> sum: 1100000100011101, cout: 0

0011000010111010 1101111101001111 1 -> sum: 0001000000001010, cout: 1
1101110000101110 1101000110110110 1 -> sum: 1010110111100101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
